name: Volume-Enhanced 10-Day Momentum Swing
description: Long-only daily momentum strategy for liquid large-cap U.S. equities. Enters when volume surge (≥1.7x 20-day average) aligns with 10-day ROC>+6 % and close>10-day SMA. Exits when momentum fades (ROC<+2 %) or price loses SMA. Hard stop 4.5 % and profit target 9 % (2R). Risk capped at 1.5 % equity per trade via fixed-fraction sizer.
